a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTDTPPregnancy3 (IMMZ.D2.DT.DTP.Pregnancy starting with 3 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Diphtheria and tetanus vaccine schedule in pregnant women who received 3 childhood diphtheria-tetanus-pertussis (DTP) doses * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTDTPPregnancy3

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"No tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
No tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered
Client is currently pregnant

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered"
"The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered
Client is currently pregnant
The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 3

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"
"The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered
The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 3"

operand.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1
Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2
Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 3

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses were already administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is currently pregnant and the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client for first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses were already administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is currently pregnant and the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 3

then.value: Should vaccinate client for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
"Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

operand.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1
Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

def.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.'
"Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.

when.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.

"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is currently pregnant and the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.'
